title: inthanuchu varNimpa
sahitya:
intanucu varNimpa taramA bramhEndrAdulakaina



anupallavi



kantuniganna mA cakkani kalyANa rAmacandra nI sogasu



caraNam 1



callani cUpula kannalu marijAbilli kalala gErina Ananamu

     mellani mATala bhayakaramu livi mella sahajamaina nI guNa



caraNam 2



anyula gOri ghOra tapamu lennennO jEsi varamulandi mUr-

     dhanyulainavAri madambula rAjanya laghuvuna naNacE parAkrama



caraNam 3



vAgIshAdi surakOtlaku vEdAgama shAstramulaku ganagUDani 

     nAgarAja bhUSaNuDaina shrI tyAgarAja sannuta nIdu mahima
